title: `[window] option_as_alt = "Both"` completely breaks Keyboard input
body:
When `option_as_alt` (macos only configuration option in the `window` category) is set to `Both` in the config, Alacritty treats every keypress as if the option key is pressed.
This makes alacritty completely unusable as you cannot enter any commands.
(Doesn't happen when with any other configuration of `option_as_alt`.)

This was introduced by commit db903503df024a3f5066937fbe0272be88226738 (July 11) on master.

### System

OS: macOS
Version: alacritty 0.13.0-dev (fce7fda3)

### Logs

`alacritty --print-events`:
`g` pressed twice, once without `option` pressed, once with `option` pressed and alacritty closed with `cmd`+`q` afterwards
